content.title: TOS Surgical Approaches
content.definition: Transaxillary, supraclavicular, combined, or infraclavicular approaches. Choice based on pathology and surgeon experience.
content.statement: TOS Surgical Approaches is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Pathology Thoracic-Outlet-Syndrome that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.

explanation.intuition: Understanding TOS Surgical Approaches helps build foundational knowledge. The concept connects to broader principles in the field.
explanation.key_insight: The key aspects of TOS Surgical Approaches include core principles, common applications, and integration with related concepts.
explanation.technical_details: Technical details involve specific mechanisms, measurements, and evidence-based applications of TOS Surgical Approaches.

clinical_pearls: Key point about TOS Surgical Approaches

citations.source: UpToDate. (2024). TOS Surgical Approaches. Wolters Kluwer.
Harrison's Principles of Internal Medicine, 21st ed. McGraw-Hill.
